q: What do I need to have my own website?
How long does it take to develop a website?
What maintanance does my website require?
How is accessibility implemented in websites?
a: A website project (design and development), a hosting solution and a domain name are the minimal requirements to own a website
A hosting solution is the means of hosting your website project in a server to be accessible for everyone.
The website Domain Name is the name by wich your website can be accessed such as www.google.com for example.
Aproximatly 4 week, depending on the project size.
E-commerce, or electronic commerce, is the buying and selling of goods and services over the internet.
is the process of designing products, services, and internal operations to facilitate expansion into international markets.

Keeping the website software up to date, Monitoring the website for errors, Backing up the website data, Optimizing the website for search engines, Testing the website for performance, Updating the website content and Managing the website's security

Search engine optimization (SEO) is the process of improving the visibility of a website or a web page in search engine results pages (SERPs). The goal of SEO is to make sure that your website or web page appears as high as possible in the SERPs for relevant keywords.

is a web design approach that makes web pages render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes. The goal of responsive design is to make sure that your website looks good and is easy to use on all devices, regardless of the screen size or resolution.

Accessibility is the practice of designing websites and applications that can be used by everyone, regardless of their abilities. This includes people with disabilities such as visual impairments, hearing impairments, and mobility impairments.
